name: Clayton Ferrara
what_you_do: Protégé Nonprofit Solutions, Inc. provides consulting services to launch new nonprofits and assist existing organizations with their operational needs, including business formation and IRS compliance.
who_you_serve: They serve nonprofit founders and existing nonprofit organizations looking for guidance in establishing and managing their operations.
bio: Nearly 15 years of experience in nonprofit consulting.
business_focus: Protégé Nonprofit Solutions, Inc. provides consulting services to launch new nonprofits and assist existing organizations with their operational needs, including business formation and IRS compliance. (nonprofit consulting)
